archimate:Requirement.name: SY.2.2.1d: d) by reviewing event logs relating to system and network activity regularly (e.g. to identify poor response times, lack of network bandwidth or delays in voice traffic)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
